articles.title: Passengers from ‘at-risk’ countries should expect to stay in airports for 3-4 hours after arrival - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: With the identification of the Omicron variant of the Covid-19 virus, the Indian government has stipulated testing for all passengers flying in from the UK, Europe and 11 other countries.
articles.content: A day after the Indian government came out with guidelines to regulate the entry of international passengers from countries that have detected the Omicron variant of the coronavirus, many visitors ha… [+4095 chars]
